channel.title: Unfinished My Little Pony Rarity Vector
channel.description:
I attempted to make a vector of Rarity from MLP and I got too bored to finish the eyes and teeth. There's no solid body color yet, since I need to see through it when working on the hair and lines that cross over into the body, which is why you can see a hair line through her horn.
[img]http://puu.sh/J7YI[/img]
Here's what I was going for:
[img]http://puu.sh/J80f[/img]
I used Inkscape, and I was unable to find out how to make Rarity's hair a gradient, so I just used a solid color.
~Lin
